description:
Given a letter sent to Rio from the Emperor, Kanata searches the city and ponders a question asked by Mishio of what her dreams of the future are.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bangai Hen, Dai 13 Wa: Sora no Oto - Yume no Kanata
The Sound of the Sky: Dream`s Horizon
番外編 第13話「空の音·夢ノ彼方」
